item.description:
Summer Kick-Off Rally & Ride
Special guest: Globe reporter, Meg Murphy (read details about her story below)

Tis the season (finally) for Cookouts!
Please join us for refreshments, camaraderie and fun
   
ALSO! The Boston Globe wants to meet you!
Come Celebrate and share your Scooter Enthusiasm!

The Boston Globe is creating a feature story for the South Shore Edition about scooterists and scooter lifestyle.  Reporter, Meg Murphy has chosen Our 1st Annual Rally as a common ground to meet and talk with many scooterists. A Globe photographer will be here too!
     
Meg focuses on on passions and pass times that bring people from different walks of life together. She is very interested in learning about you and the scooter community, what, why, where you ride, scooter clubs, etc.. This is NOT a Scooter Business Promotion, It's a Scooter Lifestyle Story, it's about YOU!

Please join us to celebrate and share your passion for scooters, promote your club and get in the newspaper! Help us have a good turn out for a great Scooter PR story! Scooter Solidarity!

As usual with our Rallys, there will be a GROUP RIDE following the Rally for those interested. (We may split the group in two; 50cc's and 150cc & up, depending on the #s joining in. We'll coordinate that on the spot.)
item.name: Summer Kick Off Rally & Ride. with GLOBE Scooter enthusiast Media Coverage!
